channel.title: hs on Barefoot Rob
channel.description: Recent content in hs on Barefoot Rob

item.title: Day
item.description: (transcribed 6:09pm CST Saturday 25 January 2003) 3:10 P.M. April 5 Yesterday when I called Christina she was gone. When I called Charmain, she didn't want to do anything. so I rode around at the school. Today I went to church. Jessica, Cheri, and Emily were there. We talked about AIDS. Dad brought some rubbers there to show us them and teach us about "safe sex." As if we don't know.

item.title: Today
item.description: (transcribed 5:32pm CST Thursday 23 January 2003) April 3 1:20AM. I finished 33 notecards out of 40 today. I can do the rest at school. I wrote Lila a big long letter. I did some extra Spanish work. I stayed after school and worked in Algebra and Spanish. I saw the Cougar Charms practice. Mmm, Mmm. Sweet pussy! 1:22 - It looks like no one can read this now...

item.title: Today
item.description: (transcribed 4:35pm CST Wednesday 22 January 2003) 3:50P.M. I’m going to quit writing down what I eat. It takes up to much room and doesn’t do much good. 1st Period - I wrote an outline for my research paper and I turned in a thesis statement. Miss Carter wrote it (thesis) though. 2nd we graded tests. Donald Martin graded mine. I got a 47 on it but he wrote it so it looked like a 97.

item.title: Today
item.description: (transcribed 4:18pm CST Wednesday 22 January 2003) 3:50P.M. I had 2 bowls of Crispix for breakfast. For lunch, I had a roll, tea, and pizza and veggie sticks. For a snack I had a piece of cake, milk, slice of meat, and graham crackers. 1st pd. Library. I worked on my paper more. 2nd I failed a test. I have about a 50 in there. 3rd. We found out what is on our test tomorrow.
